statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, preferences FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT location, age FROM customers WHERE preferences LIKE '%coffee%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age, preferences FROM customers WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT customer_id, location, preferences FROM customers WHERE preferences LIKE '%vegan%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_customers_in_location FROM customers GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_customers_in_location DESC;
SELECT customer_id, location, age, preferences FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY location, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location, customer_age FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_preferences FROM customers WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT segment_name, segment_criteria FROM marketing_segments;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_age <= 25
SELECT MAX(customer_age) AS max_age FROM customers WHERE customer_location = 'New York'
SELECT segment_name, COUNT(*) AS customers_in_segment FROM marketing_segments JOIN customers ON marketing_segments.segment_id = customers.customer_id GROUP BY segment_name
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_preferences IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_age DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerLocation;
SELECT city, state FROM CustomerLocation WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_id, age FROM CustomerAge WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, communication_preference FROM CustomerPreference WHERE brand_preference = 'Nike';
SELECT city, state, country FROM CustomerLocation ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerLocation WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age, birthdate FROM CustomerAge WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, brand_preference FROM CustomerPreference WHERE brand_preference = 'Nike';
SELECT customer_id, age, birthdate, brand_preference FROM CustomerAge JOIN CustomerPreference ON CustomerAge.customer_id = CustomerPreference.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, city, state FROM CustomerLocation WHERE state = 'CA' ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, preference FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM marketing_communication WHERE group_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT city, state, country FROM locations WHERE city = 'San Francisco';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, preference FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM customers WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT c.name, l.city, ac.description FROM customers c JOIN locations l ON c.location = l.city JOIN age_groups ac ON c.age BETWEEN ac.min_age AND ac.max_age;
SELECT mc.customer_id, mc.content, l.city, l.country FROM marketing_communication mc JOIN locations l ON mc.location_id = l.location_id WHERE l.country = 'USA';

SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, name, preferences FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM location_segments WHERE location = 'London';
SELECT segment_name, preferences FROM preferences_segments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM location_segments WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM age_segments WHERE min_age < 20 AND max_age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, preferences, segment_name FROM customers JOIN preferences_segments ON customers.preferences = preferences_segments.preferences;
